items.title: Translate text messages
items.description: Lark provides translation for 18 languages: English, Chinese.

items.title: Schedule messages to be sent later
items.description: Send scheduled messages in chats when working across time zones or when you're on leave.

items.title: Check read or unread status of messages
items.description: Check whether a message you've sent has been read by the recipient.

items.title: React to messages using emojis
items.description: React to messages in a chat using emojis and everyone in the chat can see them.

items.title: Streamline communication with threads
items.description: Connect all the relevant messages and replies in the chat without distraction from unrelated messages.

items.title: Send audio messages
items.description: Automatically convert audio messages you receive into text if you prefer reading over listening to messages.
